Octociz was about to enter the Ark when it started up again. 
Oblitertron was firing at Prowl and Iron Raptor and some other bots 
were firing at Zardus.

"What the hell??!?!?! I though we had called a CEASE FIRE!!!!!!!" 
Octociz pulls out his blasters and heads back into the fray, waiting 
to see what will happen next.
